content:
I'm not sure if I did something or if this server was updated, but Zulip was previously much bluer than it is now.
I'm using the dark theme, and here's how it looks right now:

image.png

Compare to an old image I found online, which shows the colors Zulip had yesterday (this is a very old version, but with the same colors):

image.png

Visually I think the difference is that channel and topic links are no longer blue, and the background became lighter (previously #1c1c1c, now #242424). I believe the background of unread topics was also blue, and now it's gray (#2e2e2e).

I know I can fix this with Zulip's custom CSS, but what caused the change? Is it an update or a setting?
I also tested Zulip's own server now, and it has the new non-blue look, but idk how it looked yesterday.

Thanks!
Here's a screenshot from 2 weeks ago of the blue Zulip I want to get back to: #Zulip meta > Adjusting display @ ðŸ’¬
Yes, we are updating the design of recent conversations to better match the current design of the rest of the app. Specific feedback on the new design is much appreciated.
